query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `red_flags` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `name_en` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `name_ar` varchar(255),
  `category` varchar(100),
  `description` text,
  `clinical_significance` text,
  `associated_conditions` text,
  `urgency_level` enum('immediate','urgent','semi_urgent') DEFAULT 'urgent',
  `recommended_action` text,
  `time_to_treatment` varchar(100),
  `facility_required` varchar(255),
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `red_flags_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `medications_knowledge` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `generic_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `brand_names` text,
  `name_ar` varchar(255),
  `drug_class` varchar(100),
  `mechanism` text,
  `indications` text,
  `contraindications` text,
  `side_effects` text,
  `interactions` text,
  `dosage_adult` text,
  `dosage_pediatric` text,
  `dosage_elderly` text,
  `route_of_administration` varchar(100),
  `availability_iraq` enum('widely_available','limited','rare','not_available') DEFAULT 'widely_available',
  `approximate_cost` varchar(100),
  `requires_prescription` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `pregnancy_category` varchar(10),
  `lactation_safety` varchar(100),
  `renal_adjustment` text,
  `hepatic_adjustment` text,
  `monitoring_required` text,
  `special_instructions` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `version` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  CONSTRAINT `medications_knowledge_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

  `availability_iraq` enum('widely_available','limited','rare','not_available') DEFAULT 'widely_available',
